original_text: The locusts were like horses that were ready to fight in a war. They wore something on their heads that seemed to be gold crowns. Their faces looked like human faces.
korean_text: 황충들의 모양은 전쟁을 위하여 준비한 말들 같고 그 머리에 금 같은 관 비슷한 것을 썼으며 그 얼굴은 사람의 얼굴 같고

sentences.original_text: that were ready to fight in a war
They wore something on their heads
that seemed to be gold crowns
Their faces looked like human faces
